Immigration Documents: Take the IELTS/CELPIP Exams for English Literacy
Get all relevant documents copied and certified
Arrange and Collect birth and marriage certificates
Children: Ensure children have the necessary documentation as well as parents
Give notice to the school about the move
Make sure children are vaccinated and have documentation
Pets: Make sure to have Pet Documentation as needed by your travel agency, such as vaccination records
Get Pet Passports cleared for flight
Make sure they have all needed and relevant shots
